headline: Raymond James Advances Asset Management and Practice Management Advisor Support with Leadership Appointments
summary: The firm announced the appointment of both Doug Brigman to president of Asset Management Services and Michelle Lynch to senior vice president, Practice Management and Growth ConsultingST. PETERSBURG, Fla., April 08, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Raymond James is bolstering its commitment to deliver a best-in-class platform for financial advisors in support of their clients with the announcement of two leadership appointments.
